thread.section_title: Seven Women Maternity Apparel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Seven Women Maternity Apparel | sevenwomen.ca
thread.title: Carly
thread.title_full: Seven Women Maternity Apparel reviewed by Carly

author: Carly
title: Carly
text:
I bought my first ever pair of maternity jeans on their online store.
They send me an email before shipping my order to let me know how the jeans I ordered truly fit and to double check the size I ordered before shipping them to me.
Amazing customer service experience and I LOVE the jeans I got! (Seraphine Gerie distressed underbelly).
I will definitely be shopping with them again.
